Articles.Content:
Hello:

Whenever I load up KSP (32-bit), the letters become boxes and weird stuff happens: [http://imgur.com/a/GwSUC](http://imgur.com/a/GwSUC)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-20T02:27:03Z" title="03/20/2015 02:27  AM" data-short="9 yr">March 20, 2015</time> by crashy**
Do you have the latest update for your graphics card?
This appears to happen with OpenGL on.

Sorry crashy, openGL is not supported on Windows, only DirectX9.

It's probably just a corrupt font, you can download replacement Arial fonts **here** ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-21T18:47:46Z" title="03/21/2015 06:47  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 21, 2015</time> by sal\_vager**
